title: The Tolkien Trilogy  for Commodore 64
material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Two cassettes, paper manual, plastic cassette tray in a cardboard case
brief_description: Contains three games: ‘The Hobbit’, ‘Lord of the Rings’ and ‘Shadows of Mordor’. The games are loosely based on “The Hobbit” and “The Lord of the Rings” novels by J.R.R Tolkien
